.. _cli_docs:

Command Line Tools
======================

These command line tools can be accessed through the Windows Command Prompt (see :ref:`windows_terminal`) or from  *Bash* terminal in Linux and MacOSX.

   headreco
   mri2mesh
   dwi2cond
   simnibs

   simnibs_python
   eeg_positions
   msh2cortex
   msh2nii
   nii2msh
   mni2subject
   mni2subject_coords
   subject2mni
   subject2mni_coords
   get_fields_at_coordinates
